attributes.action: public enquiry into deaths of persons in social care during this pandameic.
attributes.additional_details: Having worked in social care for over 25 years the systematic desemenation of care structures, has left a system that failed to protect those most vulnerable, we as a society are judged on how we protect those most vulnerable by failing them we fail ourselves.
attributes.background: A public enquiry to see if measures that where put in place at the beginning of this pandameic failed to protect those living in social care settings, and what could have been done to prevent those deaths.
